page.title: 05BILLINGE HOSPITAL
page.content: The hospital was first opened on May 3rd,1910,having previously been used as a workhouse.It has been extensively modernised.There are 3 main blocks:the Maternity Unit and Ante-Natal Clinic; the Geriatric Unit and the general wards.The Operating Theatre was opened on December 4th,1958.On January 27th,1961,the Psychiatric Consultation and Treatment Unit was created.The newest building is the Roy Hartley Maternity Unit which cost a staggering Â£1,500,000.This was opened on May 21st,1968.The hospital has a total of 562 beds.The grounds stretch for a third of a mile.
